Traits.Name: Shadowy Physique
Traits.Content: The Barghest’s body is partially insubstantial, giving it resistance to damage from non-magical weapons.

Traits.Name: Curse of the Wounded
Traits.Content: Any creature hit by the Barghest’s claw attacks must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or suffer from a lingering curse that prevents healing for 1d4 hours.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hound of Dead makes three attacks with its claws and can replace one claw attack with its nightmarish bite.

Actions.Name: Claw Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. A creature hit must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or suffer from a lingering curse that prevents healing for 1d4 hours.

Actions.Name: Nightmare Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. The creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Shadow Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) necrotic damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. A creature hit must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or be unable to take reactions until the start of its next turn.
